game.name: Happy Glass
game.description:
This glass becomes happy if you can fill it up with water. Can you dare to solve this puzzle by putting your logical analysis to the test? Join Happy Glass and get ready to face off endless brilliant challenges in hundreds of awesome levels! Your job is to draw a line or any figure that could help the glass fill with the enough water. It sounds easy, but challenges get bigger when you enter the advanced levels so be careful to deal with them confidently. 

Pay attention to the details and follow all the necessary game rules to master all the modes of this brand new arcade challenge! Start a line to create a figure that can fill the glass up with water till the line you notice at its top area! Make sure to get the job done without falling the glass between the gaps. This glass would only be happy if you can help it capture all the falling water. Grab your pencil and draw lines or figures to manage the flow of the water!

There are 100 unique and challenging levels to play through and it is also combined with cool graphics and lovely music. In each level, you would notice a tap, several platforms and a glass placed somewhere on the screen. Use your mouse on desktop or tap the screen on mobile phone to draw lines in this html5 puzzle game! You can take the help of the platforms to secure your lines. Fill up your glass till the marked line to complete all the levels with 3 stars rating! Check out more similar free puzzle games on atmegame.com without download or installing any app
